ai-atk-s0510a19:1_0: the Elder Kuṭikaṇṇatissa, Plough-King, and so on,
ai-atk-s0510a19:2_0: and other twenty-five hundred Theras of Mount Vediyaka. There is no single senior of these ten hosts of the Theras who went to the Theras. This was the ten doctrines of the Theras.
ai-atk-s0510a19:2_1: For that is why it should be understood that the Elders have done in the past, the future, and present in the preceding the recitation, the wide, and the way already described.
